com.magnet.base64

Interface Base64


  • @Contract
public interface Base64
    A service for Base64 codec, abstracting out the underlying physical implementation details.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] decode(byte[] input)
      Decode the Base64-encoded data in input and return the data in a new byte array.
      byte[] decode(String input)
      Decode the Base64-encoded data in input and return the data in a new byte array.
      String decodeToString(byte[] input)
      Decode the Base64-encoded data in input and return the data in a new byte array.
      String decodeToString(String input)
      Decode the Base64-encoded data in input and return the data in a new byte array.
      byte[] encode(byte[] input)
      Base64-encode the given data and return a newly allocated byte[] with the result.
      byte[] encode(String input)
      Base64-encode the given data and return a newly allocated byte[] with the result.
      String encodeToString(byte[] input)
      Base64-encode the given data and return a newly allocated String with the result.
      String encodeToString(String input)
      Base64-encode the given data and return a newly allocated String with the result.
      Charset getCharset()
